alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 3:25PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Box Elder and central Tooele Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 325 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Knolls, or 38 miles east of Wendover, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Grantsville, Delle, Knolls, Utah Test and Training Range North, Clive, Skull Valley, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range, Tooele Army Depot, Utah Test and Training Range South and Rush Valley. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 21 and 85. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys
